description: A compilation (vol. 3) of 70 animated shorts featuring the pre-1948 Warner Bros. cartoons that had been part of the Associated Artists Productions (a.a.p.) library which Turner had acquired, featured on a LaserDisc released by MGM...
keywords: compilation of short films,compilation of animated films,studio compilation,compilation,looney tunes
name: The Golden Age of Looney Tunes - The LaserDisc Collection, Volume 3: 70 Complete Uncut Cartoons, 1931-1948
